activities: CompIntelligence maintains personal data regarding clients on secure systems. This information is collected to aid CompIntelligence in conducting business operations. In addition to the personal data itself, the information which CompIntelligence protects includes contact details and information within source and reference files sent to perform data conversion projects.
contactoff1: CompIntelligence, Inc., 1 Jacks Hill Road Oxford, CT 06478
personaldata: We do not manually process data.
recoursemech: We agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures established in the Safe Harbor Principles regarding personal information received from the EEA. With respect to complaints related to our Privacy Policy that cannot be resolved through our internal Corrective/Preventive Action Process, we agree to abide by the dispute resolution procedures established by the EU Data Protection Authorities.
